issue.title: [JS] Use Flatbuffers Typescript generator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1158](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1158). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is included in Flatbuffers 1.7.0 released a little over a week ago

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1158?focusedCommentId=16064864) by Brian Hulette (bhulette):*
I actually made a ticket for this just after the TS PR was merged, ARROW-949. I just started working on it last week after I realized it had been released, you can see my branch here:
 https://github.com/ccri/arrow/tree/flatbuf-typescript. Unfortunately, I ran into what looks like a bug in the TS generator and filed an issue: https://github.com/google/flatbuffers/issues/4365

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1158?focusedCommentId=16064874) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Thanks! I closed this as a duplicate
